text: But What If This Is Love () is a 1961 Soviet drama movie directed by Yuli Raizman.Умер актер Игорь ПушкаревА ЕСЛИ ЭТО ЛЮБОВЬ It stars Zhanna Prokhorenko, Igor Pushkaryov, and Alexandra Nazarova. == Actors == * Zhanna Prokhorenko as Ksenia * Igor Pushkaryov as Boris * Alexandra Nazarova as Nadya * Nina Shorina as Rita * Nadezhda Fedosova as Tatyana, Ksenya's mother == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1961 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Yuli Raizman
title: But What If This Is Love
